description: SSP-based RCP scenario with very-low forcing by the end of the century.  Forcing will be substantially beolow RCP2.6 in 2100. SSP1-2.0 is a likely candidate for this scenario.

Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
